item.title: [Application] Inventory Management: The Art of Balancing Supply and Demand
item.description:
In this post, I explain what inventory management is, why it matters, and how organizations can systematically improve it using mathematical optimization. I first discuss inventory management from a generic perspective, highlighting the key principles, policies, and challenges. Then, I dive into a practical case study on spare parts inventory management, showing how optimization can be applied to determine ideal reorder points, order quantities, and service levels.
